comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of July 14, 1912 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F10915FC39581373... indicates that New York City was establishing fixed markets for pushcarts, in order to get the vendors off the streets.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks so much for this citation swanq. What a fascinating story. This may well be one of the market locations chosen by the city.
